modName: The Baltic States ENBs for vanilla weathers and NLA plugin
summary: Realistic style presets for ENB 319 with support for vanilla lighting/weather and for NLA plugin
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]THE BALTIC STATES ENBs[/size]

The Baltic States ENBs are realistic presets with a color scheme inspired by the flag of each country.

currently supports ENB binary 319


ENB versions on this page are for vanilla lighting/weather or for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/]NLA plugin[/url]﻿


[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/762bc23eed3267e20c57e6613a0e125b/tumblr_nun7wcoA4g1rn7420o1_250.jpg[/img]



[size=5]Estonian ENB[/size]: realism with cool colors

[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/ee191f0479622a96b93069672554df19/tumblr_p4qm1iTrwC1s2ptqso10_1280.jpg[/img]﻿
[size=5]

Latvian ENB[/size]: realism with warm colors 

[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/982749bb039c2e46cf6898c0ab0c0442/tumblr_p4qmq2ktR51s2ptqso10_1280.jpg[/img]﻿

[size=5]Lithuanian ENB[/size]: vibrant and saturated realism


[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/9c7384221914bd15424a1fb1d78dd792/tumblr_p4qs806OyT1s2ptqso8_1280.jpg[/img]﻿


Installation
1.Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost files from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]here[/url] to your Skyrim folder (wrapper version,)

2.Copy and paste your chosen Baltic ENB files to your Skyrim folder. Choose from Lithuanian, Latvian, or Estonian edition.   

3.Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values:
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0 
bFXAAEnabled=0 
iMaxAnisotropy=0



- thread fixes are disabled by default
- parallax terrain is disabled by default
- auto detect memory size is enabled by default.  Disable it if you what to set your own videomemorysizeMB in ENBlocal
*** - If you take screenshots using Steam overlay, open the injector.ini and change the steam hack from 0 to 1(it's the last entry in the injector.ini file).  
-to disable Depth of Field, open enbseries.ini and change EnableDepthOfField=false
- to enable/disable letterbox effect (black bars on top and bottom of the screen), open enbseries folder and look for effect.ini.  Open the effect.txt.ini and change  letterbox to true to enable, false to disable




For more advice on optimizing Skyrim and ENB check out:

1) Optimization Guide for Skyrim and ENB : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?[/url]

2) S.T.E.P Guide: http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB

Vivid Weathers edition of Baltic States is here :[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69493] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69493[/url]﻿
